body: this doujin is good though it would be great if we saw Momo pregnant

I love this, tho I kinda wish we did see Momo pregnant. honestly I would love to see a To love-Ru doujin series that has all the girls from their confesstion to 7 years in the future. I would love to know how Gid - Sephie an Rito's mom & dad would react to all he's  daughters falling for same guy and a lot of other girls to. I honestly want to see this harem to work out even if its kinda forced by Gid. It would be the first harem that's got it all right so far just get rid of Haruna. #MomoYamiMikanLala.
